(ROOT
  (SBARQ (RB So)
    (WHADVP (WRB how))
    (SQ (VBP do)
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VB improve)
        (PP (IN on)
          (NP
            (ADJP (RB already) (JJ yummy))
            (NNP Hokkien) (NNP Mee)))))
    (. ?)))


advmod(improve-5, So-1)
advmod(improve-5, how-2)
aux(improve-5, do-3)
nsubj(improve-5, you-4)
root(ROOT-0, improve-5)
prep(improve-5, on-6)
advmod(yummy-8, already-7)
amod(Mee-10, yummy-8)
nn(Mee-10, Hokkien-9)
pobj(on-6, Mee-10)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Well))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Well-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP
      (VP (VB add)
        (NP (NNP Sio) (NNP Bak)))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VB simmer)
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP
            (NP (DT a) (NN claypot))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WDT that))
              (S
                (VP (VBZ 's)
                  (NP (WRB how)))))))))
    (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, add-1)
nn(Bak-3, Sio-2)
dobj(add-1, Bak-3)
cc(add-1, and-4)
conj(add-1, simmer-5)
prep(simmer-5, in-6)
det(claypot-8, a-7)
pobj(in-6, claypot-8)
nsubj(how-11, that-9)
cop(how-11, 's-10)
rcmod(claypot-8, how-11)

    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VBG Simmering)
      (S
        (S
          (NP (DT the) (NNP Sio) (NNP Bak))
          (VP (VBZ infuses)
            (NP (DT the) (NNS noodles))
            (PP (IN with)
              (NP (JJ extra) (NN flavor)))))
        (CC and)
        (S
          (NP (DT the) (NN sio) (NN bak))
          (ADVP (RB also))
          (VP (VBZ absorbs)
            (NP
              (NP (DT some))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (DT the) (NN prawn) (NN stock))))
            (PP (IN from)
              (NP (DT the) (NNP Hokkien) (NNP Mee) (NNP !!)))))))))


root(ROOT-0, Simmering-1)
det(Bak-4, the-2)
nn(Bak-4, Sio-3)
nsubj(infuses-5, Bak-4)
dep(Simmering-1, infuses-5)
det(noodles-7, the-6)
dobj(infuses-5, noodles-7)
prep(infuses-5, with-8)
amod(flavor-10, extra-9)
pobj(with-8, flavor-10)
cc(infuses-5, and-11)
det(bak-14, the-12)
nn(bak-14, sio-13)
nsubj(absorbs-16, bak-14)
advmod(absorbs-16, also-15)
conj(infuses-5, absorbs-16)
dobj(absorbs-16, some-17)
prep(some-17, of-18)
det(stock-21, the-19)
nn(stock-21, prawn-20)
pobj(of-18, stock-21)
prep(absorbs-16, from-22)
det(!!-26, the-23)
nn(!!-26, Hokkien-24)
nn(!!-26, Mee-25)
pobj(from-22, !!-26)

  (UCP
    (VP (VBN Firm)
      (CC and)
      (VBN infused)
      (PP (IN with)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Kim) (POS 's))
    (VP (VBZ uses)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (JJ thick) (NN bee) (NN hoon))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S
            (S
              (NP (PRP I))
              (VP (VBP prefer)))
            (CC and)
            (S
              (NP (DT the) (NNS noodles))
              (ADVP (RB always))
              (VP (VBZ tastes)
                (NP
                  (ADJP
                    (ADJP (JJ fresh))
                    (CC and)
                    (ADJP (RB not) (RB too) (JJ Jia)))
                  (NN Lard))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(uses-3, Kim-1)
possessive(Kim-1, 's-2)
root(ROOT-0, uses-3)
det(hoon-7, the-4)
amod(hoon-7, thick-5)
nn(hoon-7, bee-6)
dobj(uses-3, hoon-7)
dep(prefer-10, which-8)
nsubj(prefer-10, I-9)
rcmod(hoon-7, prefer-10)
cc(prefer-10, and-11)
det(noodles-13, the-12)
nsubj(tastes-15, noodles-13)
advmod(tastes-15, always-14)
conj(prefer-10, tastes-15)
amod(Lard-21, fresh-16)
cc(fresh-16, and-17)
neg(Jia-20, not-18)
advmod(Jia-20, too-19)
conj(fresh-16, Jia-20)
dobj(tastes-15, Lard-21)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN Before)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBP rush)
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Kim) (POS 's))
            (NP
              (FRAG
                (PP (IN at)
                  (NP (NNP Joo) (NNP Chiat)))
                (, ,)))))))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (EX there))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (CD 1) (NN thing))
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (MD should)
              (VP (VB know)))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (DT The) (NNP Sio) (NNP Bak))
      (VP (VBD was)
        (VP (VBN purchased)
          (ADVP (RB elsewhere)))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (NNP Kim) (POS 's))
      (ADVP (RB simply))
      (VP (VBD added)
        (NP (PRP it))
        (PP (IN into)
          (NP (PRP$ their) (JJ claypot) (NN HKM)))))
    (. .)))

amod(HKM-16, claypot-15)
pobj(into-13, HKM-16)

              (VP (TO to)

(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP
      (QP (CD 10) (CD Enough)))
    (PP (IN for)
      (NP
        (NP (CD 3) (NNS people))
        (CC or)
        (NP (CD 2) (JJ big) (NNS eaters))))
    (. .)))

conj(people-5, eaters-9)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (ADVP (RB never))
      (VP (VBD tried)
        (NP (NNP Sio) (NNP Bak))
        (PP (IN with)
          (NP (NNP HKM))
          (, ,))))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
      (VP (VB know)
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP what))
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (VBP are)
              (ADJP (VBG missing)))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(know-4, you-1)
aux(know-4, do-2)
neg(know-4, n't-3)
root(ROOT-0, know-4)
dobj(missing-8, what-5)
nsubj(missing-8, you-6)
cop(missing-8, are-7)
ccomp(know-4, missing-8)
